forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and a few clouds. High 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and a few clouds. High 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low around -5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low 24F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 9C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 49F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around -5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 26F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early with periods of light rain and snow developing later in the day. High 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 54F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. Low -2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Low 31F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early becoming more scattered later. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early with a chance of lingering snow showers later. High around 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of snow after midnight. Low -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 80%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of snow after midnight. Low 26F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 80%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. High 2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 12-20cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. High 38F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 5 to 8 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low around -5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 12-20cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 26F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. High 1C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 37F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early, then some snow showers later at night. Low -6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional snow showers later during the night. Low 24F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High near 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High 43F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low around -5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low near 25F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. High 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High 39F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low near 20F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 2C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 38F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers or flurries. Low -7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with snow flurries and snow showers, especially overnight hours. Low 22F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
